channel.title: shiny on DSPG 2020
channel.description: Recent content in shiny on DSPG 2020

item.title: Results Section Two
item.description: /* this chunnk of code centers all of the headings */ h1, h2, h3 { text-align: center; } ##Modeling Census Tract Level Evictions : Richmond: Visualizing An Index Of Eviction Intensity The Eviction Intensity Index we created from our regression model was used to rank all census tracts in U.S. cities that are comparable in size to Richmond. The word cloud below visualizes the frequency that census tracts with the words “Richmond City” show up in a list of the top 320 most eviction intense tracts in the U.

item.title: Results Section Three
item.description: /* this chunnk of code centers all of the headings */ h1, h2, h3 { text-align: center; } ##Modeling Census Tract Level Evictions: Visualization of Socio-Demographic Variables and Eviction Rates in Richmond 2013-2018 To provide further guidance for policymakers interested in understanding evictions in Richmond, we provide a collection of dashboards that can be used to visualize the socio-demographic variables that our statistical model identified as being associated with eviction rates.
